scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts the Crucifixion of Christ, with Christ on the cross in the center. He is wearing a loincloth and has a halo. To the left of the cross stands the Virgin Mary, cloaked in blue, with another figure in pink behind her. To the right, several figures are present, including one in a golden robe holding a spear, and others in blue and pink attire, some wearing helmets. The background is a decorative pattern of blue and gold squares. The ground is depicted as green and uneven.
